QuestData.Title: Eoin Dunwald
QuestData.Description: Eoin's one of the twins. He's got a penchant for the drink. You'll likely be findin' him over by the old well - the ale stores were in a building there.$B$BMind making him to pay his worrying sister a visit? Shouldn't take much convincin' if you can get to the ale first.
QuestData.RewardText: Of all the buildings in all the towns to collapse, why'd it have to be this one?!
